scripts.all: npm run build && npm run size && npm run minified && npm run gzipped
scripts.asbundle: module=${module:-cjs}; echo $(tput bold)asbundle$(tput sgr0);time asbundle $module/main.js > asbundle.js
scripts.browserify: module=${module:-cjs}; if [ "$module" != "cjs" ]; then rm -rf browserify.js && exit 0; fi; echo $(tput bold)browserify$(tput sgr0);time browserify $module/main.js > browserify.js
scripts.build: npm run asbundle && npm run browserify && npm run rollup  && npm run webpack && npm run html
scripts.gzipped: echo $(tput bold)gzipped$(tput sgr0);for f in $(ls *.js); do echo "$f $(uglifyjs $f --compress --mangle | gzip | wc -c)"; done
scripts.html: rm -rf test/*.html; for f in $(ls *.js); do echo "<!doctype html><script>var process={env:{}};</script><script src='../$f'></script>" > test/${f:0:-3}.html; done
scripts.minified: echo $(tput bold)minified$(tput sgr0);for f in $(ls *.js); do echo "$f $(uglifyjs $f --compress --mangle | wc -c)"; done
scripts.size: echo $(tput bold)size$(tput sgr0);for f in $(ls *.js); do echo "$f $(cat $f | wc -c)"; done
scripts.test: for f in $(ls *.js); do node test/validate.js $f; done
scripts.webpack: module=${module:-cjs}; echo $(tput bold)webpack$(tput sgr0);time webpack $module/main.js webpack.js
